<<<<<<< HEAD
A plaine and familiar exposition on the Lords prayer first preached in divers sermons, the substance whereof, is now published for the benefit of the church / by I.D. ... Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
[4], 211 p.
Printed by I.D. for Daniel Pakeman, and are to be sold at the signe of the Raine-bow, neere the Inner-Temple gate in Fleet-street, London : 1634.
"Humilitie heapeth honor." "Imprimatur; Rob. Austine. Feb. 4. 1632"--Colophon. Signatures: A² B-2D⁴ 2E². Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======
